name: white-smoke
short_effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The Pokémon is protected by its white smoke, which prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
